    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createDataFile()
    Checks if the data file exists and creates it if it doesn't.
    void
    getLevelingData()
    Tries to retrieve the leveling data from the data file and applies it to specified PlayerLevelingSystems.
    void
    saveLevelingData()
    Saves data to the json file with specified name in the VLevels plugin's folder.
    void
    setAutoSave(long ticks)
    Sets every how many ticks the data will be automatically written to the data file.

  • Constructor Details

    • VLevelsStorageSystem

      public VLevelsStorageSystem(String filename, VLevels plugin, PlayerLevelingSystem[] systemsToSave) throws VLevelsRecurringVariablesException
      Parameters:
      filename - Name of the .json file in which this system's data should be stored and retrieved.
      systemsToSave - Systems that should be tracked and saved by this system.
      plugin - Instance of VLevels plugin.
      Throws:
      VLevelsRecurringVariablesException - Indicates that file names or PlayerLevelingSystem IDs are repeated.

  • Method Details

    • createDataFile

      public void createDataFile()
      Checks if the data file exists and creates it if it doesn't.

    • getLevelingData

      public void getLevelingData()
      Tries to retrieve the leveling data from the data file and applies it to specified PlayerLevelingSystems.

    • saveLevelingData

      public void saveLevelingData()
      Saves data to the json file with specified name in the VLevels plugin's folder.

    • setAutoSave

      public void setAutoSave(long ticks)
      Sets every how many ticks the data will be automatically written to the data file.

      This method works only once. Reusing it won't do anything.

      Parameters:
      ticks - Normally, 20 game ticks = 1 second.
